name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE FAN FUN ISLAND【 #ホロライブ3期生1stライブ 】 [IPeU2_BOwA8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive 3rd Generation discuss their current situation in another world and prepare to move into the forest. They conclude the free portion of the livestream.
The livestream free part ending screen is displayed.

subtitles.original: し、この島の力を取り戻したら、みんなのことはちゃんと元の世界に戻せるから。
subtitles.english: And once I've restored this island's power, I'll be able to return you all to your original world.

subtitles.original: るしあちゃん、謝らないで。
subtitles.english: Rushia-chan, please don't apologize.

subtitles.original: まあ、そういうことならしょうがないでしょう。
subtitles.english: Well, if that's the case, it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: 無人島探索、しかも異世界だからね。せっかくなら、
subtitles.english: Desert island exploration, and in another world too. Since we're here...

subtitles.original: 楽しむしかないっしょ！
subtitles.english: ...we might as well enjoy it!

subtitles.original: まあ確かに、ある意味夢のような経験ではあるしね！
subtitles.english: Well, certainly, in a sense, it's a dream-like experience!

subtitles.original: 会場のみんなも配信で見てるみんなもいいぺこか？
subtitles.english: Is it good for everyone in the venue and everyone watching the stream, peko?

subtitles.original: ぺこらたちは今異世界にいるんだけど、みんなのことも見えてるよ！
subtitles.english: Pekora and the others are in another world right now, but we can see all of you!

subtitles.original: みんなが楽しむ気持ちも必要だから、ちゃんと盛り上がってぺこね！
subtitles.english: We need your excitement too, so make sure to get hyped up, peko!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: みんな、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you.

subtitles.original: うーん、でも具体的には何をすればいいんじゃろうか？
subtitles.english: Hmm, but specifically, what should we do?

subtitles.original: うん。まずはそのあたりを説明するね。
subtitles.english: Yeah. First, I'll explain all that.

subtitles.original: でも、いつまでも海辺だとあれだから、一旦森の方に移動しながらにしよう。
subtitles.english: But we can't stay on the beach forever, so let's move toward the forest while we talk.

subtitles.original: うん、そうしようか。
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's do that.

subtitles.original: 森か。久しぶりだなあ。
subtitles.english: The forest, huh? It's been a while.

subtitles.original: あ、そっか。エルフ、エルフの森！
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right. An elf, an elf's forest!

subtitles.original: エルフの森ぺこか。エルフの森だったっけ？
subtitles.english: An elf's forest, peko? Was it an elf's forest?

subtitles.original: ご両親にご挨拶しなきゃ。
subtitles.english: I have to greet your parents.

subtitles.original: いないでしょ！無人島ぺこだって！
subtitles.english: They're not there! I said it's a desert island, peko!

subtitles.original: エルフの森だから。
subtitles.english: Because it's an elf forest.

subtitles.original: 無料パートはここまでになるので、続きはよければチケットを買って楽しんでね！
subtitles.english: The free part ends here, so please buy a ticket and enjoy the rest if you'd like!

subtitles.original: みんなの力も必要になるから、ぜひよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: We'll need everyone's help too, so please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: ん？なんか言った？おー？
subtitles.english: Hmm? Did you say something? Oh?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、早速行こう！
subtitles.english: Well, let's go!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: 楽しみだね。めっちゃ楽しみだね。
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it. Really looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE FAN FUN ISLAND
subtitles.english: HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE FAN FUN ISLAND

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました
subtitles.english: The free part has ended

subtitles.original: ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you for watching!
